mapper.insert: insert into user(USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_PASSWORD, USER_SEX, USER_BIRTHDAY, USER_EMAIL, USER_MOBILE, USER_ADDRESS) values (#{USER_ID}, #{USER_NAME}, #{USER_PASSWORD}, #{USER_SEX}, #{USER_BIRTHDAY}, #{USER_EMAIL}, #{USER_MOBILE}, #{USER_ADDRESS})
mapper.select: select USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_PASSWORD from user
